Package com.example.carturestibackend.controllers

Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
com.example.carturestibackend.controllers.OrderController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/order") public class OrderController extends Object
Controller class to handle HTTP requests related to orders.

  • Method Details

    • getOrders

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<OrderDTO>> getOrders()
      Retrieves all orders.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a list of OrderDTO objects representing the orders.

    • insertOrder

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Long> insertOrder(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid OrderDTO orderDTO)
      Inserts a new order.
      Parameters:
      orderDTO - The OrderDTO object representing the order to insert.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the ID of the newly inserted order.

    • getOrder

      @GetMapping("/{id_order}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<OrderDTO> getOrder(@PathVariable("id_order") long orderID)
      Retrieves an order by its ID.
      Parameters:
      orderID - The ID of the order to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the OrderDTO object representing the retrieved order.

    • deleteOrder

      @DeleteMapping("/{id_order}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteOrder(@PathVariable("id_order") long orderID)
      Deletes an order by its ID.
      Parameters:
      orderID - The ID of the order to delete.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity indicating the success of the operation.

    • updateOrder

      @PutMapping("/{id_order}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<OrderDTO> updateOrder(@PathVariable("id_order") long orderID, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid OrderDTO orderDTO)
      Updates an order by its ID.
      Parameters:
      orderID - The ID of the order to update.
      orderDTO - The updated OrderDTO object representing the new state of the order.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the updated OrderDTO object.
